## üéØ What You Get
üñºÔ∏è **Tabbed Browsing & Fast Rendering**: Open multiple images in separate tabs for efficient workflow and experience rapid loading even for high-resolution and RAW files.
‚úÇÔ∏è **Built-in Editing & Annotation Tools**: Perform essential edits (crop, rotate, resize) and add annotations, text, or shapes directly to images without opening another app.
üìÅ **Integrated File Management**: Navigate folders, preview thumbnails, rename, move, or copy files within the viewer's sidebar, combining viewing and file organization.

## About EdgeView
EdgeView is a modern, feature-rich image viewer designed as a powerful alternative to basic operating system preview tools. It excels in handling professional workflows, offering exceptional support for a wide array of formats, including high-resolution RAW files from DSLR and mirrorless cameras. The application is built for speed and efficiency, utilizing hardware acceleration to ensure smooth browsing and zooming through large image collections. Its clean, customizable interface puts the focus on your images while providing quick access to a comprehensive suite of viewing and management tools, making it an ideal choice for photographers, designers, and anyone who regularly works with large numbers of images.

Beyond simple viewing, EdgeView enhances productivity by integrating capabilities typically found in separate applications. The tabbed interface allows you to keep several images open for comparison or reference. The robust file management panel eliminates the need to switch back and forth between the viewer and Finder or File Explorer. Additional features like slide show modes, batch conversion/renaming, support for PDF and video files, and customizable keyboard shortcuts cater to advanced user needs. By combining a fast rendering engine with practical organizational and light editing tools, EdgeView serves as a central hub for all your image viewing and management tasks.

---

## ‚ú® EdgeView Advantages
‚úî **Excellent RAW & Hi-Res Support**: Seamlessly opens and displays RAW formats from major camera manufacturers alongside standard image types.
‚úî **Unified Workflow Environment**: Combines a fast viewer, file manager, and basic editor in one application to minimize app switching.
‚úî **Highly Customizable**: Adapt the toolbar, keyboard shortcuts, and viewing modes to match your personal workflow preferences.

---

## ‚öôÔ∏è System Requirements
*   **Supported Platforms**: macOS and Windows.
*   **Operating System**: Latest version of macOS or Windows 10/11 recommended.
*   **Memory**: 4 GB RAM minimum (8 GB or more recommended for handling multiple high-resolution RAW files).
*   **Storage**: 200 MB of free disk space for application installation.
*   **Graphics**: A dedicated GPU is beneficial for optimal performance with 4K+ images and smooth zooming.

---

## üìà Use Cases
*   **Photographers**: Quickly cull, review, and compare RAW photos from a shoot, perform basic edits, and organize files.
*   **Designers & Digital Artists**: View reference images, textures, and design proofs in high fidelity with accurate color representation.
*   **General Users & Hobbyists**: Manage large personal photo libraries, view images in various formats, and perform quick edits and annotations.
